[1m[31m  [1m● [22m[1mReview Routes › DELETE /api/reviews/:id › should delete a review[39m[22m

[2m[22m

[2m     [90m 159 |[39m       [36mif[39m (res[33m.[39mstatusCode [33m===[39m [35m200[39m) {[22m

[2m    [0m [90m 194 |[39m[22m
